ej,bevit801,M,younl901,Fighting with Brewers Mgr Phil Garner ej,garnp001,M,younl901,Fighting with White Sox Mgr Terry Bevington $Jeff Cirillo tagged Ozzie Guillen and then fell on him; Guillen shoved Cirillo and it was over; Brewers manager Phil Garner and White Sox manager Terry Bevington both ran onto the field; Brewers infielder Kevin Seitzer got in the middle of the discussion; Garner stepped between Seitzer and Bevington; the two managers exchanged profanities and Bevington put Garner in a head lock; Bevington and Garner were ejected by HP umpire Larry Young; both were suspended for four games
